author: jasnell
message:
src: fix missing deprecation assignment

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/23809
Reviewed-By: Refael Ackermann <refack@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Vse Mozhet Byt <vsemozhetbyt@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Matteo Collina <matteo.collina@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Colin Ihrig <cjihrig@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Luigi Pinca <luigipinca@gmail.com>

files.patch: @@ -2235,7 +2235,7 @@ It will become an error in future versions of Node.js. ### DEP0119: process.binding('uv').errname() private API - + +Type: Runtime + +Windows Performance Counter support has been removed from Node.js. The +undocumented `COUNTER_NET_SERVER_CONNECTION()`, +`COUNTER_NET_SERVER_CONNECTION_CLOSE()`, `COUNTER_HTTP_SERVER_REQUEST()`, +`COUNTER_HTTP_SERVER_RESPONSE()`, `COUNTER_HTTP_CLIENT_REQUEST()`, and +`COUNTER_HTTP_CLIENT_RESPONSE()` functions have been deprecated. + [`--pending-deprecation`]: cli.html#cli_pending_deprecation [`Buffer.allocUnsafeSlow(size)`]: buffer.html#buffer_class_method_buffer_allocunsafeslow_size
